name: Lux Mesopotamiae The Brotherhood of the Galactic Guardians of the Light

metadata.name: Qarib
metadata.description: Qarib, the Nephilim, is a creature of immense power and insatiable energy thirst. Qaribâ€™s thirst for power is never-ending, making him a formidable foe to anyone who crosses his path. He is a skilled fighter and a masterful strategist. Coming from another dimension, Qarib has led the Black Order of evil since aeons and is said to be the closest ancestor of Astartus, the Lord of All Demons. He is feared by all because of his power, cunning and cruelty. His strength and abilities make him a very dangerous opponent and it is best to avoid any confrontation with him.
